meanings.definition: A room in a school where classes are held.
meanings.sent1: In our school, the classrooms have colorful walls and big windows.
meanings.sent2: The students gathered in the classrooms for their math lesson.
meanings.sent3: The classrooms were so full of energy, it felt like a party!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a classroom, filled with knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chalk and books filled the classrooms, creating a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The group of students in a particular class.
meanings.sent1: The classrooms were excited to participate in the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: The teacher knew all the names of the students in her classrooms.
meanings.sent3: The classrooms cheered loudly when they won the spelling bee.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt warm seeing the unity among the classrooms.
meanings.sent5: The classrooms' laughter echoed through the hallways, bringing joy to all.
